title: 83.3 (LOA)
content:
The man's familiar, broad face has been weathered by years of strong wind, and his eyes are surrounded by a forest of wrinkles from a lifetime of squinting into the sun. He pulls his hand out of the pocket of his long coat and thrusts it forward.

He speaks with the drawl of the Messipian seafolk. "Always good to see a Ranger," he says. "Perhaps you'd like to make a trade?"

Clear Ren Kobo with   to trade with him.

His smile broadens. "Also, perhaps I can interest you in attending the swap meet at my market? People are coming from all over the Valley to trade items of great significance. I'm sure you'd find it incredibly beneficial—both spiritually and commercially! I'm on my way to the market now. You should join me! The journey is always more pleasurable when shared with a friend. Don't you agree?"

Gain the LIMITED TIME OFFER mission. Write 199.1 three days from now on the day tracker.

Travel to Kobo's Market to participate in the swap meet. There you'll have the opportunity to gain some of the reward cards you may have missed from the Lure of the Valley campaign.
